info.gateways.gate_pearl:
A Rift Pearl allows you to summon a Rift by using it on a block.

It can only be used when the new Rift would not be too close to another Rift, based on the current spacing.
info.gateways.gate_pearl.2:
An open Rift will fail in a burst of lightning if it cannot spawn a mob, any active mob walks too far away, or the wave timer elapses.

Rewards will spawn from the Rift as they are obtained.
error.gateways.no_space: There's not enough space to open this Rift
error.gateways.wave_failed: The Rift imploded because there was not enough space to spawn the next wave
error.gateways.too_far: The Rift imploded because a wave entity ran too far away
error.gateways.entity_discarded: The Rift imploded because an entity was removed without being killed
